snippet.title: Fading Remnants - Playthrough (2D indie adventure)
snippet.description:
-- Fading Remnants - Playthrough (2D indie adventure) --
The earth has changed these past few years. Humanity is a lonely shell of what it once was, and the world is a very different place. In the face of such hardship, how does one cope with loss, and how far would you go for family? 

In a small country town overcome by nature, Lia and her friends are on the trail of someone they hold very dear. Journey with them as they meet strange new people, solve puzzles and search for answers in a world that have forgotten mankind.  If Lia can push through the haunting memories of her past, perhaps she'll discover a path toward something that feels closer to home. 

This is an IGMC 2018 submission, and a prototype.  

https://lazybumstudio.itch.io/fading-remnants

Updated         Nov 02, 2020
Published Nov 29, 2018
Status         Prototype
Platforms Windows
Authors         LazyBumStudio, hiddenone, futrchamp, Gabrelik, Plueschkatze
Genre         Adventure, Visual Novel
Made with RPG Maker, Adobe Photoshop, FL Studio
Tags         2D, Anime, Atmospheric, emotional, Female Protagonist, Hand-drawn, RPG Maker, Singleplayer, Story Rich
Average session About an hour

-- Fading Remnants - Playthrough (2D indie adventure) --
